# Address API

- [Address API](#address-api)
  - [Address Information](#address-information)
  - [Address Balance](#address-balance)
  - [Address Transactions](#address-transactions)
  - [Address Basic Transactions](#address-basic-transactions)
  - [Address Contract Transactions](#address-contract-transactions)
  - [Address ARC20 Token Transactions](#address-arc20-token-transactions)
  - [Address UTXO List](#address-utxo-list)
  - [Address Balance History](#address-balance-history)
  - [Address ARC20 Balance History](#address-arc20-balance-history)


## Address Information

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address
```

**Request**
```
GET /address/QQpX2WUPPdPXXL6AcwCX8KNHeDv7un2A4N
```

**Response**
```json
{
  "balance": "479862014295",
  "totalReceived": "1080372781156",
  "totalSent": "600510766861",
  "unconfirmed": "0",
  "staking": "0",
  "mature": "479862014295",
  "arc20Balances": [
    {
      "address": "EJ28w1xczFNfHuB51qfpijv6NsurGskVeF",
      "addressHex": "09800417b097c61b9fd26b3ddde4238304a110d5",
      "name": "QBT",
      "symbol": "QBT",
      "decimals": 8,
      "balance": "65887500000000"
    },
    {
      "address": "EMMhYYQ5HtaJUg6FgPYkM4TbgZbNDUifRV",
      "addressHex": "2e1b8528c07539b5dd9a76f3374adf09f1ab6075",
      "name": "EPC",
      "symbol": "EPC",
      "decimals": 18,
      "balance": "100590999000000000000000000"
    },
    {
      "address": "ER8xXcVq6HmXLfPUKmQpusvtxoHoAM9uC3",
```

## Address Balance

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/balance
GET /address/:address/balance/:category
GET /address/:address/balance/total-received
GET /address/:address/balance/total-sent
GET /address/:address/balance/unconfirmed
GET /address/:address/balance/staking
GET /address/:address/balance/mature
```

**Request**
```
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance/total-received
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance/total-sent
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance/unconfirmed
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance/staking
GET /address/QWSTGRwdScLfdr6agUqR4G7ow4Mjc4e5re/balance/mature
```

**Response**
```
13793159465
947344479217
933551319752
8813010
1324147120
8545640
```


## Address Transactions
Returns all transaction ids the address related to.

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/txs
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Block--Timestamp-Filter-Parameters">
                Block / Timestamp Filter Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request**
```
GET /address/QZDJya5Szfux2op7qhHUGKsBT4eGiyTPkH/txs?limit=10&offset=0&reversed=false
```

**Response**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 80545,
  "transactions": [
    "421544cbf222b7f1a359a853c8c9892e59d75e9b3472a85035a1e47aea3c114e",
    "297670963e9e42114906b53bcff9f3be912cc0541b74392425da22b5b05ac51e",
    "a3c935bfbde8062aa238ca7eb12c7e5207d857ba94febc190eb4d8089fed7499",
    "d54401b2cdd1e220a1c240084c842e76d7e3518ae0797349fe5f7bb92198e4c5",
    "6e25a7010ffd63c2e7372ebac2b0a7592b23400f165838bbbe499ee1cd03383d",
    "4db83285f4f8daf7d5d1da275ee544e359612436d07d869de97b1792f2e6de89",
    "1a3bb2a8186855919562a5206bcb156abc7c140b3a2093f6c03b6d36cecfc3f9",
    "49e6534784a767779096a8ebada7006aacada8ac33aaf2bf91a65983d7ba69bf",
    "78adb76cce84a36bd85b8b35248032980503cc98c8d5eb767046b9d993ffc3b2",
    "530b4a013b89a99b4c495e35f22a87d7bb0295f429c224d5b618bbe3c499f562"
  ]
}
```


## Address Basic Transactions
Returns all transactions the address changes it's ALV balance.

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/basic-txs
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Block--Timestamp-Filter-Parameters">
                Block / Timestamp Filter Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request**
```
GET /address/QZDJya5Szfux2op7qhHUGKsBT4eGiyTPkH/basic-txs?limit=5&offset=0&fromBlock=90000&toBlock=100000
```

**Response**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 5329,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "id": "7916c298f41eecaa0a374b072935bb2a8f374477c3fd8020f82e626424d93e5d",
      "blockHeight": 99992,
      "blockHash": "05299ec1cf87d8730b20681a4a144eca75dceee79ddb448d11ea49fa42b5b946",
      "confirmations": 306176,
      "amount": "767552708353",
      "inputValue": "386894221404",
      "outputValue": "386894036948",
      "refundValue": "0",
      "fees": "184456"
    },
    {
      "id": "6755b1465b77fe8689f21429d040afa9acf4ba4b163a5827446a2ae96957df44",
      "blockHeight": 99990,
      "blockHash": "e01fb5572658a490b0efb6240ad773dd200f67dd9804d555802a0cbbbd52d4ab",
      "confirmations": 306178,
      "amount": "779673687474",
      "inputValue": "392787985630",
      "outputValue": "392787801174",
      "refundValue": "0",
      "fees": "184456"
    },
    {
      "id": "d3fb812ca7cbc119a9e6c580b38b7e95b870468440106a0267d9335e178c1cdd",
      "blockHeight": 99990,
      "blockHash": "e01fb5572658a490b0efb6240ad773dd200f67dd9804d555802a0cbbbd52d4ab",
      "confirmations": 306178,
      "amount": "785570316596",
      "inputValue": "392790250526",
      "outputValue": "392780066070",
      "refundValue": "0",
      "fees": "10184456"
    },
    {
      "id": "889c9454d60504b247a8e9347e27c90e7efb1a3a3c121932f4404e13690dc77f",
      "blockHeight": 99990,
      "blockHash": "e01fb5572658a490b0efb6240ad773dd200f67dd9804d555802a0cbbbd52d4ab",
      "confirmations": 306178,
      "amount": "7932080",
      "inputValue": "52025000000",
      "outputValue": "52679042901",
      "refundValue": "0",
      "fees": "-654042901"
    },
    {
      "id": "228caae9d417dec8cbcc1d4f85f1f9809e46d97669e9fa3a49475236af6a8167",
      "blockHeight": 99953,
      "blockHash": "2c7c161eb0b4116958089e8a864e9bf0caeb0e43867470fd84ee355304523f3c",
      "confirmations": 306215,
      "amount": "787821432652",
      "inputValue": "395039104246",
      "outputValue": "395038898405",
      "refundValue": "0",
      "fees": "205841"
    }
  ]
}
```


## Address Contract Transactions
Returns all transactions the address calls a contract.

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/contract-txs
GET /address/:address/contract-txs/:contract
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Block--Timestamp-Filter-Parameters">
                Block / Timestamp Filter Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request #1**
```
GET /address/QaRg6Nrf5uMEggBGv8v8SpzdK6NqWZEf3F/contract-txs/6b8bf98ff497c064e8f0bde13e0c4f5ed5bf8ce7?limit=3&offset=0
```

**Response #1**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 20,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "transactionId": "819d9ecdc09ea9cc728529a2365a41b1374cdda61b9196ccb818120de8ebbf99",
      "outputIndex": 1,
      "blockHeight": 167992,
      "blockHash": "9fa6859caa2a4be19be6c10c48f0c4eba58853b01d583cc7004d1a674abb891c",

      "type": "evm_call",
      "gasLimit": 3500000,
      "gasPrice": 40,
```

**Request #2**
```
GET /address/QaRg6Nrf5uMEggBGv8v8SpzdK6NqWZEf3F/contract-txs?limit=3&offset=10&fromBlock=160000&toBlock=170000
```

**Response #2**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 5,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "transactionId": "cb078a1057f6973c95776874aa06967b61895b8f179fc64f521f44e65775450b",
      "outputIndex": 0,
      "blockHeight": 168476,
      "blockHash": "959959f0617e2f187b382b9f95ba789720a10adf2315892b7a0b90633508cf3e",
      "confirmations": 237700,
      "type": "evm_call",
      "gasLimit": 3500000,
      "gasPrice": 40,
      "byteCode": "",
      "outputValue": "0",
      "outputAddress": "b4e5b0d964866c61d454ae0a9895d5f92612d009",
      "outputAddressHex": "b4e5b0d964866c61d454ae0a9895d5f92612d009",
      "sender": "QaRg6Nrf5uMEggBGv8v8SpzdK6NqWZEf3F",
      "gasUsed": 2912645,
      "contractAddress": "b4e5b0d964866c61d454ae0a9895d5f92612d009",
      "contractAddressHex": "b4e5b0d964866c61d454ae0a9895d5f92612d009",
      "excepted": "None",
      "exceptedMessage": "",
      "evmLogs": [
        {
          "address": "6b8bf98ff497c064e8f0bde13e0c4f5ed5bf8ce7",
```

## Address ARC20 Token Transactions

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/arc20-txs/:tokenAddress
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Block--Timestamp-Filter-Parameters">
                Block / Timestamp Filter Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request**
```
GET /address/QXUANYANRVAeX2Tomy9W1FTV6LQxWiNc99/arc20-txs/fe59cbc1704e89a698571413a81f0de9d8f00c69
```

**Response**
```json

  "totalCount": 5,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "transactionId": "0a357149342eb76b4cc95d2c129a0551cbe7b658ef9fd982b6bc63216ca44d4d",
```

## Address UTXO List

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/utxo
```

**Request**
```
/address/QReceive4V6rE6XU5dqoGLokwhcLnoKnUH/utxo
```

**Response**
```json
[
  {
    "transactionId": "d2be50b6b5b31da4ee5e0a68f2ec15f2310e442b49486bca6db15a2f706c2c1e",

    "scriptPubKey": "21036f2f1ad6d7edc0a65c6dc1a817cafcd6c0884177bdc95531ade77ceb287d793eac",
    "value": "32410000000",
    "isStake": true,
    "blockHeight": 391823,
    "confirmations": 15483
  },
  {
    "transactionId": "d2be50b6b5b31da4ee5e0a68f2ec15f2310e442b49486bca6db15a2f706c2c1e",
    "outputIndex": 2,

    "blockHeight": 391823,

  },
```

## Address Balance History

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/balance-history
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request**
```
GET /address/QReceive4V6rE6XU5dqoGLokwhcLnoKnUH/balance-history?limit=5&offset=0
```

**Response**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 186,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "id": "56552f57c051bf4a0d3b08b499ad94a80370f7d0061dcdea0395cd2dd1044b19",

      "blockHeight": 407212,
      "timestamp": 1562838640,
      "amount": "40000000",
      "balance": "117868455770"
    },
    {
      "id": "cf14a7e947fc4804c250d87f3371b4103c978411caac71dcce6e2f164f1d28da",
      "blockHash": "808c777848e07e2cf0da3516d3699910202eac172a0ca3ed06919a19c8b670a3",
      "blockHeight": 400963,
      "timestamp": 1561946176,
      "amount": "27300000000",
      "balance": "117828455770"
    },
    {
      "id": "6f504de1c9010144ad07e9d0cd02e5309ac0705f60692cb1b3ed7beb47c77cfc",
      "blockHash": "be4826d984c6d9463d08c6efd90385bb735af270231bd114a1eb5cf981452ccd",
      "blockHeight": 399730,
      "timestamp": 1561770976,
      "amount": "24900000000",
      "balance": "90528455770"

    {

      "blockHeight": 392595,
      "timestamp": 1560748832,
      "amount": "-195001754400",
      "balance": "65628455770"
    },
    {
      "id": "1c6ec5c4e7ac8953d3aa88c4fc25e16ae715336dc10bfc6976d5d9c885af8dd8",
```

## Address ARC20 Balance History

**Request URL**
```
GET /address/:address/arc20-balance-history
GET /address/:address/arc20-balance-history/:token
```

**Request Parameters**
<table>
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th>Name</th>
            <th>Default</th>
            <th>Description</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr>
            <td colspan="3">
              <a href="https://github.com/alveyproject/alveyinfo-api/blob/master/README.md#Pagination-Parameters">
                Pagination Parameters
              </a>
            </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
            <td>
              <code>reversed</code>
            </td>
            <td>
              <code>true</code>
            </td>
            <td>Return records reversed</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

**Request #1**
```
GET /address/QXUANYANRVAeX2Tomy9W1FTV6LQxWiNc99/arc20-balance-history?limit=5&offset=0
```

**Response #1**
```json
{
  "totalCount": 8,
  "transactions": [
    {
      "id": "0a357149342eb76b4cc95d2c129a0551cbe7b658ef9fd982b6bc63216ca44d4d",

          "address": "fe59cbc1704e89a698571413a81f0de9d8f00c69",

          "name": "INK Coin",
          "symbol": "INK",
          "decimals": 9,
          "amount": "-1000000000",
          "balance": "59572945840"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "0a357149342eb76b4cc95d2c129a0551cbe7b658ef9fd982b6bc63216ca44d4d",
      "blockHash": "43c49f64124304654cc5083cd8d120ef251cf7193c0e0444f13ebcb2af0fbe85",
      "blockHeight": 204018,
      "timestamp": 1533573664,
      "tokens": [
        {
          "address": "fe59cbc1704e89a698571413a81f0de9d8f00c69",
          "addressHex": "fe59cbc1704e89a698571413a81f0de9d8f00c69",
          "name": "INK Coin",
          "symbol": "INK",
          "decimals": 9,
          "amount": "-1000000000",
          "balance": "60572945840"
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "id": "1e7ac9c6a1bce955ce8792130618779b0a4f9b36ad38b4aafb7f2124254010d8",
      "blockHash": "57314f2f664c694c345c27ab840a2134ff9b62bb9b652a03e9e64e3a22916c4e",
```
